title: Udyr needs a skin
body: udyr hasnt gotten since 31-Mar-2015 where is the love for the godyr?

replies.body:
No boobs, no furry, no kpop. He can't have skins.
Instead, Riot will give Lux and Ahri 3 skins each before the year ends. Happy now?

> [{quoted}](name=Otivnaig,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=fiMB4tB3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-19T12:10:40.034+0000)
>
> No boobs, no furry, no kpop. He can't have skins.
> Instead, Riot will give Lux and Ahri 3 skins each before the year ends. Happy now?

Lol what are you talking about.

Udyr is the ultimate furry there is.

Literally his whole kit is dressing up as an animal and acting like them.
Udyr needs a VGU, thus no skins

> [{quoted}](name=DA wooper knight,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=fiMB4tB3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-19T05:00:41.058+0000)
>
> give him some love riot

I guess Riot's let him off because he has an ultimate skin...but even that needs an update to truly be an ultimate skin now, like what happened to Pulsefire Ezreal. 

I think he should get a visual update as a whole though. But as for a new skin for him, I would definitely be down for an Elderwood Udyr. Wouldn't that fit his theme so much?
